tier_verification: This case appears to be misclassified as tier 1. All claims describe operational improvements, efficiency gains, and consulting services - classic tier 1 optimization activities. No evidence of business model reinvention, new market creation, or AI as core value proposition. This should be reclassified as tier 1.
